name: CreateLandingPageFolders
description:
Create multiple landing page folders in HubSpot CMS.

Use this tool to create multiple folder objects for landing pages in HubSpot CMS as specified in the request details.

parameters.name: folders_to_create
parameters.description: A JSON array detailing the new folders to create, including their names, parent folder IDs, and other metadata.

deletedAt.description: The timestamp (ISO8601 format) when this content folder was deleted.

parentFolderId.description: The ID of the content folder this folder is nested under

name.description: The name of the folder which will show up in the app dashboard

id.description: The unique ID of the content folder.

category.description: The type of object this folder applies to. Should always be LANDING_PAGE.

value_schema.description: The JSON array of new Folders to create.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: The JSON array of new Folders to create.

deletedAt.description: The timestamp (ISO8601 format) when this content folder was deleted.

parentFolderId.description: The ID of the content folder this folder is nested under

name.description: The name of the folder which will show up in the app dashboard

id.description: The unique ID of the content folder.

category.description: The type of object this folder applies to. Should always be LANDING_PAGE.

value_schema.description: The JSON array of new Folders to create.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
